# Unigram
# orth
U00:%x[-2,0]
U01:%x[-1,0]
U02:%x[0,0]
U03:%x[1,0]
U04:%x[2,0]

# class
U10:%x[-2,1]
U11:%x[-1,1]
U12:%x[0,1]
U13:%x[1,1]
U14:%x[2,1]

# cas
U21:%x[-1,2]
U22:%x[0,2]
U23:%x[1,2]

# gnd
U32:%x[0,3]

# nmb
U41:%x[-1,4]
U42:%x[0,4]
U43:%x[1,4]

# regex feats
U61:%x[0,7]/%x[0,8]

# Bigram
B
